chart.name: File Descriptors and Segments
chart.programText:
A = data('gauge.process.open_file_descriptors', filter=filter('plugin', 'elasticsearch') and filter('host', 'integration-test-elasticsearch-1.7.1-2')).publish(label='A')
B = data('gauge.indices.segments.count', filter=filter('plugin', 'elasticsearch') and filter('host', 'integration-test-elasticsearch-1.7.1-2')).publish(label='B')

chart.description: percentile distribution over the last hour
chart.name: GC Time %
chart.programText:
A = data('counter.jvm.gc.time', filter=filter('plugin', 'elasticsearch') and filter('plugin_instance', 'elasticsearch'), rollup='max').publish(label='A', enable=False)
B = data('counter.jvm.uptime', filter=filter('plugin', 'elasticsearch') and filter('plugin_instance', 'elasticsearch'), rollup='max').publish(label='B', enable=False)
C = data('counter.jvm.gc.time', filter=filter('plugin', 'elasticsearch') and filter('plugin_instance', 'elasticsearch'), rollup='max').timeshift('1h').publish(label='C', enable=False)
D = data('counter.jvm.uptime', filter=filter('plugin', 'elasticsearch') and filter('plugin_instance', 'elasticsearch'), rollup='max').timeshift('1h').publish(label='D', enable=False)
E = ((A-C)*100/(B-D)).publish(label='E', enable=False)
F = (E).min().publish(label='F')
G = (E).percentile(pct=10).publish(label='G')
H = (E).percentile(pct=50).publish(label='H')
I = (E).percentile(pct=90).publish(label='I')
J = (E).max().publish(label='J')

chart.name: Heap %
chart.programText:
A = data('gauge.jvm.mem.heap-used', filter=filter('plugin', 'elasticsearch')).publish(label='A', enable=False)
B = data('gauge.jvm.mem.heap-committed', filter=filter('plugin', 'elasticsearch')).publish(label='B', enable=False)
C = (A*100/B).publish(label='C', enable=False)
D = (C).min().publish(label='D')
E = (C).percentile(pct=10).publish(label='E')
F = (C).percentile(pct=50).publish(label='F')
G = (C).percentile(pct=90).publish(label='G')
H = (C).max().publish(label='H')

chart.name: Cache Size (bytes)
chart.programText:
A = data('gauge.indices.cache.filter.size', filter=filter('plugin', 'elasticsearch')).sum(by=['plugin_instance']).publish(label='A')
B = data('gauge.indices.cache.field.size', filter=filter('plugin', 'elasticsearch')).sum(by=['plugin_instance']).publish(label='B')

chart.name: Top Clusters by Index Growth %
chart.programText:
A = data('gauge.indices.store.size', filter=filter('plugin', 'elasticsearch')).sum(by=['plugin_instance']).publish(label='A', enable=False)
B = data('gauge.indices.store.size', filter=filter('plugin', 'elasticsearch')).sum(by=['plugin_instance']).timeshift('1d').publish(label='B', enable=False)
C = ((A-B)*100/B).top(count=3).publish(label='C')

chart.name: Top Clusters by Search Requests
chart.programText: A = data('counter.indices.search.query-total', filter=filter('plugin', 'elasticsearch')).sum(by=['plugin_instance']).top(count=3).publish(label='A')

chart.name: Top Clusters by Indexing Requests
chart.programText: A = data('counter.indices.indexing.index-total', filter=filter('plugin', 'elasticsearch')).sum(by=['plugin_instance']).top(count=3).publish(label='A')

chart.name: Deleted Documents %
chart.programText:
A = data('gauge.indices.docs.deleted').sum(by=['plugin_instance']).publish(label='A', enable=False)
B = data('gauge.indices.docs.count').sum(by=['plugin_instance']).publish(label='B', enable=False)
C = (A*100/B).publish(label='C')

chart.name: Indexing Requests
chart.programText: A = data('counter.indices.indexing.index-total', filter=filter('plugin', 'elasticsearch')).sum(by=['plugin_instance']).publish(label='A')

chart.name: Merges/sec
chart.programText: A = data('counter.indices.merges.total', filter=filter('plugin', 'elasticsearch')).sum(by=['plugin_instance']).publish(label='A')

chart.name: Indexing Requests/sec
chart.programText: A = data('counter.indices.indexing.index-total', filter=filter('plugin', 'elasticsearch') and filter('host', 'integration-test-elasticsearch-1.7.1-2')).publish(label='A')

chart.name: Thread Pool Rejections
chart.programText:
A = data('counter.thread_pool.bulk.rejected', filter=filter('plugin', 'elasticsearch') and filter('plugin_instance', 'elasticsearch')).sum(by=['plugin_instance']).publish(label='A')
B = data('counter.thread_pool.flush.rejected', filter=filter('plugin', 'elasticsearch') and filter('plugin_instance', 'elasticsearch')).sum(by=['plugin_instance']).publish(label='B')
C = data('counter.thread_pool.generic.rejected', filter=filter('plugin', 'elasticsearch') and filter('plugin_instance', 'elasticsearch')).sum(by=['plugin_instance']).publish(label='C')
D = data('counter.thread_pool.get.rejected', filter=filter('plugin', 'elasticsearch') and filter('plugin_instance', 'elasticsearch')).sum(by=['plugin_instance']).publish(label='D')
E = data('counter.thread_pool.index.rejected', filter=filter('plugin', 'elasticsearch') and filter('plugin_instance', 'elasticsearch')).sum(by=['plugin_instance']).publish(label='E')
F = data('counter.thread_pool.merge.rejected', filter=filter('plugin', 'elasticsearch') and filter('plugin_instance', 'elasticsearch')).sum(by=['plugin_instance']).publish(label='F')
G = data('counter.thread_pool.optimize.rejected', filter=filter('plugin', 'elasticsearch') and filter('plugin_instance', 'elasticsearch')).sum(by=['plugin_instance']).publish(label='G')
H = data('counter.thread_pool.refresh.rejected', filter=filter('plugin', 'elasticsearch') and filter('plugin_instance', 'elasticsearch')).sum(by=['plugin_instance']).publish(label='H')
I = data('counter.thread_pool.search.rejected', filter=filter('plugin', 'elasticsearch') and filter('plugin_instance', 'elasticsearch')).sum(by=['plugin_instance']).publish(label='I')
J = data('counter.thread_pool.snapshot.rejected', filter=filter('plugin', 'elasticsearch') and filter('plugin_instance', 'elasticsearch')).sum(by=['plugin_instance']).publish(label='J')
K = data('counter.thread_pool.rejected').sum(by=['plugin_instance', 'thread_pool']).publish(label='K')

chart.name: Document Growth Rate %
chart.programText:
A = data('gauge.indices.docs.count', filter=filter('plugin', 'elasticsearch') and filter('host', 'integration-test-elasticsearch-1.7.1-2')).mean().publish(label='A', enable=False)
B = data('gauge.indices.docs.count', filter=filter('plugin', 'elasticsearch') and filter('host', 'integration-test-elasticsearch-1.7.1-2')).timeshift('1h').mean().publish(label='B', enable=False)
C = data('gauge.indices.docs.count', filter=filter('plugin', 'elasticsearch') and filter('host', 'integration-test-elasticsearch-1.7.1-2')).timeshift('1d').mean().publish(label='C', enable=False)
D = data('gauge.indices.docs.count', filter=filter('plugin', 'elasticsearch') and filter('host', 'integration-test-elasticsearch-1.7.1-2')).timeshift('1w').mean().publish(label='D', enable=False)
E = ((A-B)*100/B).publish(label='E')
F = ((A-C)*100/C).publish(label='F')
G = ((A-D)*100/D).publish(label='G')

chart.name: Requests/sec
chart.programText:
A = data('counter.indices.search.query-total', filter=filter('plugin', 'elasticsearch') and filter('host', 'integration-test-elasticsearch-1.7.1-2')).mean().publish(label='A')
B = data('counter.indices.indexing.index-total', filter=filter('plugin', 'elasticsearch') and filter('host', 'integration-test-elasticsearch-1.7.1-2')).mean().publish(label='B')
C = data('counter.indices.get.total', filter=filter('plugin', 'elasticsearch') and filter('host', 'integration-test-elasticsearch-1.7.1-2')).mean().publish(label='C')

chart.name: Document Growth %
chart.programText:
A = data('gauge.indices.docs.count', filter=filter('plugin', 'elasticsearch')).sum(by=['plugin_instance']).publish(label='A', enable=False)
B = data('gauge.indices.docs.count', filter=filter('plugin', 'elasticsearch')).sum(by=['plugin_instance']).timeshift('1h').publish(label='B', enable=False)
C = ((A-B)*100/B).publish(label='C')

chart.name: # Nodes
chart.programText:
A = data('gauge.cluster.number-of-nodes', filter=filter('plugin', 'elasticsearch') and filter('plugin_instance', 'elasticsearch')).max().publish(label='A')
B = data('gauge.cluster.number-of-data_nodes', filter=filter('plugin', 'elasticsearch') and filter('plugin_instance', 'elasticsearch')).max().publish(label='B')

chart.name: Deleted Documents %
chart.programText:
A = data('gauge.indices.total.docs.deleted', filter=filter('plugin', 'elasticsearch') and filter('plugin_instance', 'elasticsearch')).mean(by=['index']).publish(label='A', enable=False)
B = data('gauge.indices.total.docs.count', filter=filter('plugin', 'elasticsearch') and filter('plugin_instance', 'elasticsearch')).mean(by=['index']).publish(label='B', enable=False)
C = (A*100/B).publish(label='C')

chart.name: Search Requests
chart.programText: A = data('counter.indices.search.query-total', filter=filter('plugin', 'elasticsearch')).sum(by=['plugin_instance']).publish(label='A')

chart.name: Cache Size (bytes)
chart.programText:
A = data('gauge.indices.total.filter-cache.memory-size', filter=filter('plugin', 'elasticsearch') and filter('plugin_instance', 'elasticsearch')).mean(by=['index']).publish(label='A')
B = data('gauge.indices.total.fielddata.memory-size', filter=filter('plugin', 'elasticsearch') and filter('plugin_instance', 'elasticsearch')).mean(by=['index']).publish(label='B')

chart.description: p99 latency over the last hour
chart.name: Top Clusters by Query Latency (ms)
chart.programText:
A = data('counter.indices.search.query-total', filter=filter('plugin', 'elasticsearch'), rollup='max').publish(label='A', enable=False)
B = data('counter.indices.search.query-time', filter=filter('plugin', 'elasticsearch'), rollup='max').publish(label='B', enable=False)
C = data('counter.indices.search.query-total', filter=filter('plugin', 'elasticsearch'), rollup='max').timeshift('1h').publish(label='C', enable=False)
D = data('counter.indices.search.query-time', filter=filter('plugin', 'elasticsearch'), rollup='max').timeshift('1h').publish(label='D', enable=False)
E = ((B-D)/(A-C)).publish(label='E', enable=False)
F = (E).percentile(pct=99, by=['plugin_instance']).top(count=5).publish(label='F')

chart.name: Memory Heap Size (bytes)
chart.programText:
A = data('gauge.jvm.mem.heap-used', filter=filter('plugin', 'elasticsearch') and filter('host', 'integration-test-elasticsearch-1.7.1-2')).publish(label='A')
B = data('gauge.jvm.mem.heap-committed', filter=filter('plugin', 'elasticsearch') and filter('host', 'integration-test-elasticsearch-1.7.1-2')).publish(label='B')

chart.name: Heap %
chart.programText:
A = data('gauge.jvm.mem.heap-used', filter=filter('plugin', 'elasticsearch') and filter('plugin_instance', 'elasticsearch')).publish(label='A', enable=False)
B = data('gauge.jvm.mem.heap-committed', filter=filter('plugin', 'elasticsearch') and filter('plugin_instance', 'elasticsearch')).publish(label='B', enable=False)
C = (A*100/B).publish(label='C', enable=False)
D = (C).min().publish(label='D')
E = (C).percentile(pct=10).publish(label='E')
F = (C).percentile(pct=50).publish(label='F')
G = (C).percentile(pct=90).publish(label='G')
H = (C).max().publish(label='H')

chart.name: Cluster Shard Allocation
chart.programText:
A = data('gauge.cluster.unassigned-shards', filter=filter('plugin', 'elasticsearch') and filter('plugin_instance', 'elasticsearch')).mean().publish(label='A')
B = data('gauge.cluster.relocating-shards', filter=filter('plugin', 'elasticsearch') and filter('plugin_instance', 'elasticsearch')).mean().publish(label='B')
C = data('gauge.cluster.active-primary-shards', filter=filter('plugin', 'elasticsearch') and filter('plugin_instance', 'elasticsearch')).mean().publish(label='C')
D = data('gauge.cluster.active-shards', filter=filter('plugin', 'elasticsearch') and filter('plugin_instance', 'elasticsearch')).mean().publish(label='D', enable=False)
E = (D-C).publish(label='E')

chart.name: Cache Sizes (bytes)
chart.programText:

B = data('gauge.indices.cache.field.size', filter=filter('plugin', 'elasticsearch') and filter('host', 'integration-test-elasticsearch-1.7.1-2')).publish(label='B')

chart.name: Thread Pool Rejections
chart.programText:
A = data('counter.thread_pool.bulk.rejected', filter=filter('plugin', 'elasticsearch')).sum(by=['plugin_instance']).publish(label='A')
B = data('counter.thread_pool.flush.rejected', filter=filter('plugin', 'elasticsearch')).sum(by=['plugin_instance']).publish(label='B', enable=False)
C = data('counter.thread_pool.generic.rejected', filter=filter('plugin', 'elasticsearch')).sum(by=['plugin_instance']).publish(label='C')
D = data('counter.thread_pool.get.rejected', filter=filter('plugin', 'elasticsearch')).sum(by=['plugin_instance']).publish(label='D')
E = data('counter.thread_pool.index.rejected', filter=filter('plugin', 'elasticsearch')).sum(by=['plugin_instance']).publish(label='E')
F = data('counter.thread_pool.merge.rejected', filter=filter('plugin', 'elasticsearch')).sum(by=['plugin_instance']).publish(label='F')
G = data('counter.thread_pool.optimize.rejected', filter=filter('plugin', 'elasticsearch')).sum(by=['plugin_instance']).publish(label='G')
H = data('counter.thread_pool.refresh.rejected', filter=filter('plugin', 'elasticsearch')).sum(by=['plugin_instance']).publish(label='H')
I = data('counter.thread_pool.search.rejected', filter=filter('plugin', 'elasticsearch')).sum(by=['plugin_instance']).publish(label='I')
J = data('counter.thread_pool.snapshot.rejected', filter=filter('plugin', 'elasticsearch')).sum(by=['plugin_instance']).publish(label='J')
K = data('counter.thread_pool.rejected', filter=filter('plugin', 'elasticsearch')).sum(by=['plugin_instance', 'thread_pool']).publish(label='K')

chart.name: GC Time %
chart.programText:
A = data('counter.jvm.gc.time', filter=filter('plugin', 'elasticsearch') and filter('host', 'integration-test-elasticsearch-1.7.1-2'), rollup='max').publish(label='A', enable=False)
B = data('counter.jvm.uptime', filter=filter('plugin', 'elasticsearch') and filter('host', 'integration-test-elasticsearch-1.7.1-2'), rollup='max').publish(label='B', enable=False)
C = (A).timeshift('1h').publish(label='C', enable=False)
D = (B).timeshift('1h').publish(label='D', enable=False)
E = ((A-C)*100/(B-D)).publish(label='E')

chart.name: Merges/sec
chart.programText: A = data('counter.indices.merges.total', filter=filter('plugin_instance', 'elasticsearch') and filter('host', 'integration-test-elasticsearch-1.7.1-2')).publish(label='A')

chart.name: Average Query Latency (ms)
chart.programText:
A = data('counter.indices.search.query-total', filter=filter('plugin', 'elasticsearch') and filter('host', 'integration-test-elasticsearch-1.7.1-2'), rollup='max').publish(label='A', enable=False)
B = data('counter.indices.search.query-time', filter=filter('plugin', 'elasticsearch') and filter('host', 'integration-test-elasticsearch-1.7.1-2'), rollup='max').publish(label='B', enable=False)
C = (A).timeshift('1m').publish(label='C', enable=False)
D = (B).timeshift('1m').publish(label='D', enable=False)
E = ((B-D)/(A-C)).mean().publish(label='E')
F = (A).timeshift('5m').publish(label='F', enable=False)
G = (B).timeshift('5m').publish(label='G', enable=False)
H = ((B-G)/(A-F)).mean().publish(label='H')
I = (A).timeshift('1h').publish(label='I', enable=False)
J = (B).timeshift('1h').publish(label='J', enable=False)
K = ((B-J)/(A-I)).mean().publish(label='K')

chart.name: Active Merges
chart.programText: A = data('gauge.indices.merges.current', filter=filter('plugin', 'elasticsearch') and filter('host', 'integration-test-elasticsearch-1.7.1-2')).publish(label='A')

chart.description: percentile distribution over the last hour
chart.name: GC Time %
chart.programText:
A = data('counter.jvm.gc.time', filter=filter('plugin', 'elasticsearch'), rollup='max').publish(label='A', enable=False)
B = data('counter.jvm.uptime', filter=filter('plugin', 'elasticsearch'), rollup='max').publish(label='B', enable=False)
C = data('counter.jvm.gc.time', filter=filter('plugin', 'elasticsearch'), rollup='max').timeshift('1h').publish(label='C', enable=False)
D = data('counter.jvm.uptime', filter=filter('plugin', 'elasticsearch'), rollup='max').timeshift('1h').publish(label='D', enable=False)
E = ((A-C)*100/(B-D)).publish(label='E', enable=False)
F = (E).min().publish(label='F')
G = (E).percentile(pct=10).publish(label='G')
H = (E).percentile(pct=50).publish(label='H')
I = (E).percentile(pct=90).publish(label='I')
J = (E).max().publish(label='J')

B = data('counter.thread_pool.flush.rejected', filter=filter('plugin', 'elasticsearch') and filter('host', 'integration-test-elasticsearch-1.7.1-2')).publish(label='B')
C = data('counter.thread_pool.generic.rejected', filter=filter('plugin', 'elasticsearch') and filter('host', 'integration-test-elasticsearch-1.7.1-2')).publish(label='C')
D = data('counter.thread_pool.get.rejected', filter=filter('plugin', 'elasticsearch') and filter('host', 'integration-test-elasticsearch-1.7.1-2')).publish(label='D')
E = data('counter.thread_pool.index.rejected', filter=filter('plugin', 'elasticsearch') and filter('host', 'integration-test-elasticsearch-1.7.1-2')).publish(label='E')
F = data('counter.thread_pool.merge.rejected', filter=filter('plugin', 'elasticsearch') and filter('host', 'integration-test-elasticsearch-1.7.1-2')).publish(label='F')
G = data('counter.thread_pool.optimize.rejected', filter=filter('plugin', 'elasticsearch') and filter('host', 'integration-test-elasticsearch-1.7.1-2')).publish(label='G')
H = data('counter.thread_pool.refresh.rejected', filter=filter('plugin', 'elasticsearch') and filter('host', 'integration-test-elasticsearch-1.7.1-2')).publish(label='H')
I = data('counter.thread_pool.search.rejected', filter=filter('plugin', 'elasticsearch') and filter('host', 'integration-test-elasticsearch-1.7.1-2')).publish(label='I')
J = data('counter.thread_pool.snapshot.rejected', filter=filter('plugin', 'elasticsearch') and filter('host', 'integration-test-elasticsearch-1.7.1-2')).publish(label='J')
K = data('counter.thread_pool.rejected', filter=filter('plugin', 'elasticsearch')).sum(by=['thread_pool']).publish(label='K')

chart.name: # Hosts/Clusters
chart.programText:
A = data('counter.indices.indexing.index-total', filter=filter('plugin', 'elasticsearch')).count().publish(label='A')
B = data('counter.indices.indexing.index-total', filter=filter('plugin', 'elasticsearch')).sum(by=['plugin_instance']).count().publish(label='B')
